column8: How is AI prioritized in management meetings?
column9: Does a documented AI strategy or roadmap exist?
column10: How is AI funding and investment handled?
column11: What is your goal regarding AI vs. competitors?
column12: How do employees generally react to the topic of AI?
column13: To what extent are AI capabilities and technical literacy established across your workforce? E.g. expertise in machine learning and NLP, as well as general AI literacy for non-technical staff.
column14: How often do employees receive AI training?
column15: Is it "okay" to fail with an AI pilot project?
column16: What types of business data do you actively collect? (Select all that apply)
column17: Do you currently use any of these technologies? (Select all that apply)
column18: Describe the "cleanliness" of your business data.
column19: How comfortable is your team with data insights?
column20: How rigorously does your organization validate the technical and regulatory feasibility of an AI use case before committing resources?
column21: How many AI use cases are currently active?
column22: Do you measure the financial impact of AI projects?
column23: To what extent does AI address concrete bottlenecks in your core business operations rather than experimental topics?
column24: Are core processes documented and repeatable?
column25: How structured is your approach to planning, implementing, and delivering AI-related projects?
column26: How long to implement a new digital tool?
column27: Is there a defined path to move AI idea to production?
column28: Do you have an internal "AI Code of Conduct"?
column29: How strictly is data handled according to the EU AI Act?
column30: Who is responsible for AI outcomes and errors?
column31: What disclosure requirements exist for external partners?
column32: To what extent do you use Cloud infrastructure?
column33: What types of AI development tools are currently available in your organization? (Select all that apply)
column34: How easily can you scale new software company-wide?
column35: Why are you doing this AI assessment?
column36: Which business challenge is your top priority? (Select all that apply)
column37: How is AI influencing your organization’s strategy?
column38: Who is the primary driver of AI within your organization? (Select all that apply)
column39: Are you in charge of AI initiatives?
column40: Which option best describes your position and decision authority? (Select all that apply)
